tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE projects (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY, project_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, project_description TEXT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, budget DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE expenses (expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY, project_id INT NOT NULL, expense_description TEXT, expense_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, expense_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id))
CREATE TABLE team_members (member_id INT PRIMARY KEY, member_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, member_role VARCHAR(50), project_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id))

CREATE TABLE projects (
	project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE,
	budget DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE expenses (
	expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	project_id INT,
	expense_date DATE,
	category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_team (
	project_id INT,
	member_id INT,
	PRIMARY KEY (project_id, member_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES team_members(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE budgets (
	budget_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	project_id INT,
	allocated_budget DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
	actual_expenditure DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);
